pages.text: Originally bred to be sled dogs and hunters of Arctic animals, Alaskan Malamutes are sturdy dogs still often associated with sledding.$(br2)Standing at roughly a block tall, these thick-coated dogs come in six different coats.
These dogs are found in various snowy and cold biomes.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Salmon or Beef Treat.
